CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Daxor Corp is a medical instrumentation and biotechnology company focused on blood volume measurement. It develops and markets the BVA-100 (Blood Volume Analyzer), the first diagnostic blood test cleared by the FDA to provide safe, accurate, objective quantification of blood volume status and composition compared to patient-specific norms in a broad range of medical conditions.
